amendment.description: Amendment specifies that Title IV assistance in the legislation (Expansion of the Industrial Base) be limited to firms within the national technology and industrial base, which is defined in section 2500(1) of title 10, United States Code as those companies in the United States and Canada.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 111-467 to specify that Title IV assistance in the legislation (Expansion of the Industrial Base) be limited to firms within the national technology and industrial base, as defined in section 2500(1) of title 10, United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Murphy (CT) amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
